text: <@U06Q2P392AU> reached out to me about offering manual testing through Equalify. Before I let that thread go, I wanted to post it here. I think this would be a great way to cultivate talent. That said, we shouldn't get the cart before the horse so to speak. We need to get Equalify users, then build out initiatives like this.
